author: tng
msg: [Bug 2456] loadXML gives an exception.  Fixed by Sean Bright.  Originally, UTF-16 was set as the encoding
which caused Xerces to look for a byte order mark that would not be present
in a string (but would in a file).  Setting UTF-16LE explicitly sets the byte order.

author: tng
msg: xml4com.idl attempts to set the version of the type library to 1.5.2 when
only major.minor format is allowed.  Will cause build failure.

author: peiyongz
msg: [Bug#880] patch to PlatformUtils:init()/term() and related. from Mark Weaver
